lines.text: Honestly, what is it? If you just want to sleep with me, I don't think I'm all worth the effort. And what if it's not that, what is it you can't resist? My sparkling personality?
Danny, maybe we need to reevaluate things.
Reevaluate? You mean, as in, don't eat my ravioli, or reevaluate as Stalin might have used the word?
It's, you know, so she won't look out the window and see me and get scared.
Great, so, instead she'll be scared she's going to be hit by a torpedo!
So, what did you think, did I write it well?
Yeah... You know, er... It's hard, it's the start, it's 2 pages...
It's hard to say, it's 2 pages. It's missing the middle and an end, and most of the beginning.
Wouldn't it be easier just to say you don't like it?
So, I guess we're the big losers.
What else is there to say? We're the big losers.
I think losers says enough, really. I don't think we need to modify with big.
We all want the ones who are wrong for us, don't we? And the good ones... never even give them a chance.
I guess I've had friendships like that, where people thought we were sleeping together but we weren't.
Yeah, I've had friendships like that... I've had relationships like that.
